bibl.title: Letter from Fermin Peraza to Thomas E. Keys, May 28, 1946

div1.p: Peraza sends Keys copies of a book by Finlay. He encloses a list of Spanish language books and pamphlets about yellow fever, including prices.

div1.head: Letter from Fermin Peraza to Thomas E. Keys, May 28, 1946
div1.opener:
ANUARIO
BIBLIOGRÁFICO CUBANO
APARTADO 572
LA HABANA, CUBA
May 28, 1946.
DIRECTOR: FERMIN PERAZA
(on neptives
(Municipal Library
Bet O Querdo
& Marquez Gorgas
Dr. Thomas E. Keys, Librarian.
Mayo Clinic, Library.
Rochester, Minn.
U. S. A.
817 neptune
Dear Dr. Keys:
div1.p:
We have received your letter of May
13. We beg to hand you herein a list of books and
pamphlets about Yellow Fever, that you say that Dr.
P. S. Hench has been very much interested. We ta-
ke pleasure in sending under separate cover two co-
pies of the book “Trabajos selectos”, by Carlos J.
Finlay. Herein inclose the invoice.

UN INDICE ANUAL DE
LIBROS, FOLLETOS,
CONFERENCIAS,
BIBLIOTECAS,
REVISTAS Y PERIODICOS
DE CUBA
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, Dr. Fermin Peraza,
